thread.title: Latest public offering nets $6.5mm for Delcath
thread.title_full: Latest public offering nets $6.5mm for Delcath

title: Latest public offering nets $6.5mm for Delcath
text:
Latest public offering nets $6.5mm for Delcath Deal Date: Jul-01-2015 / Deal # 201530569 Executive Summary 
Delcath Systems Inc. (site-specific liver cancer treatment) netted $6.5mm through the public sale of 9.35mm units at $0.75 apiece. Each unit consisted of one common share, 0.75 of a five-year Series A warrant (exercisable at $0.87 for a share) and one 90-day Series B warrant (exercisable at $0.75 for one common share and 0.75 of a Series A warrant to buy another common share).
